post_content:
Have this group available as part of a lot I bought. Trying to keep my focus on PSA examples so these are available. Prices are net to me and include tracked shipping. Will also entertain trades for PSA graded T206’s that I can use in my set (PSA 3-4.5). Several I still need, so just let me know what you have.

Available via PM.

Thanks for looking!

Jeff

$SOLD Bender portrait SGC 3
$SOLD Bergen catching SGC 5
$SOLD Bresnahan portrait SGC 2.5

$SOLD Chance batting SGC 3
